title: the all new : users management frontend
body:
on discussing this in thorough detail with @jancborchardt and @raydiation past weekend, here is how we will be handling the user management in owncloud 6 the user management should share a similar user interface to the contacts application; we will collaborate to keep it consistent. as in the contacts app, the area is divided into a left sidebar and a right content area. // @tanghus

left sidebar

  • display all the groups.
  • the addition of the group is done from the left sidebar itself as in contacts app, with a button on the top.

right content

  • shows a list of users sorted in an alphabetical fashion with the admins sorted on top and the other group fellows below.
  • adding a user will move from the top navigation bar (which is not needed anymore) to the right content, being the first entry of every list with a button to â»add userâ«
here is a mockup i made to show how it will look like: ![gsoc-user-management](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/992488/499930/f90f6b8e-bc61-11e2-9d83-83890ad27e90.png) as i mentioned on #3340. i will also do acceptance tests for this to make it stable. this issue is a sum of the following: #1927 and several others mentioned there as well. suggestions are most welcome. tagging : @owncloud/designers ;)
